tool_description: Creates visual representations of price trends and historical data using various chart types and styling options.

chart_type.description: Type of chart to generate (line, candlestick, bar, area)

error_messages: Data length mismatch: price_data and timestamps arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data points: At least 2 data points required for visualization.
Invalid chart type: Use one of [line, candlestick, bar, area].
Invalid dimensions: width must be 400-2000, height must be 300-1200.
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be in ISO 8601 format.
Empty data arrays: price_data and timestamps cannot be empty.
usage: Provide price_data and corresponding timestamps arrays of equal length. Customize chart appearance with chart_type, title, and dimensions.

chart_url.description: URL to access the generated chart

chart_config.description: JSON configuration used for chart generation
